content: in this crochet tutorial we will make a mini poliwag optional as a keychain step by step perfect for gifting and decorating it s super cute quick and easy to make español https //youtu be/_ynwhbbpgu4 english https //youtu be/g-d3uq3aqcg you can find the written pattern from the video in pdf complete https //amigurumisatina etsy com/listing/1793937349 difficulty level 3/5 intermediate available languages english spanish final size 5cm / 2 inches long varies depending on materials used materials used cotton yarn blue 17 light blue 14 pink 10 white 63 black 21 you can find them here https //s click aliexpress com/e/_onohllm thank you so much for visiting my ravelry profile here are my social media links so you can follow me and see more crochet and amigurumi content ⭐️ youtube @amigurumisatina ⭐️ facebook amigurumisatina ⭐️ instagram amigurumisatina ⭐️ tiktok amigurumisatina downloadable pdf patterns available here etsy https //amigurumisatina etsy com please note this pattern is for personal use only it is forbidden to share distribute or publish this pattern on social media or any other means you can sell the finished items but don t forget to credit amigurumisatina as the designer enjoy crocheting and may your poliwag come to life with lots of love
